column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 20, 2020
column14: Loreal age defying lipstick is rich and creamy and provides plenty of moisture. The color stays on for a long duration. There is no bleeding , running, or peeling.  I will purchase again.

column6: Terrible product needs to be sealed also
column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2020
column14: Product not sealed lipstick smeared all over outside of tube

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2020
column14: Color is not as pink as pictured. This tube came unsealed and had smudge of lipstick on the inside of the tube. Not able to notify Amazon customer service as the weren’t taking calls at the time. Received hand liquid soap that had loose cap leaking all over and another makeup product unsealed.All came the same day. Truly disappointing!!!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on March 2, 2020
column14: I love this lipstick.  It doesn't dry my lips out like most of the ones I've tried.  I love the color, and will buy again.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2020
column14: This lipstick feels wonderful on my lips. Has great moisturizing ingredients for lips and feels so creamy. I purchased two shades in this line from L'Oreal and love both of them. I love this shade, Flaming Charmin, but Shade 202 Blooming Rose is so beautiful and goes with everything. I use a moisture balm on my lips to try to curb dry lips so I was surprised how fast the moisturizing in this lipstick goes away. Sometimes I use a lip primer and that helps keep moisture in. Those younger than I may not have this problem. I purchase many different lipsticks and glosses as I just love trying new colors and textures in lipstick and glosses. I do recommend this line from L'oreal.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2020
column14: I ordered the Beautiful Rosewood because it looked and sounded like a pink/rose color.  It is not - it's orange!  The lipstick itself is nice - it was deeply pigmented and felt moisturizing, but on me this color is totally orange. I understand that monitors don't always show the same color but at least call it something that describes orange.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2020
column14: I wore this for work (at home) doing a live party that lasted 45 mins and the color didn't even last to the end!  I am SO disappointed in this lipstick!  I love the shade!  It didn't feather like other lipsticks can do.  It did make my lips soft for a few hours (3), but NOT for 9 hours!  The flavor was nice and nothing strong like harsh chemicals and/or perfumes like some lipsticks have!  I wouldn't recommend this lipstick due to not lasting for color AND moisturizing!

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2020
column14: What a wonderful lipstick this is, so smooth and moisturizing.
